definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Erected in the center circle with a vertical bar disk.
sentences.chinese: 在圆周的圆心竖一根与盘面垂直的直杆。

sentences.english: Use your compasses to draw a circle to circle.
sentences.chinese: 用圆规画圆必须要有圆心。

sentences.english: A diameter passes through the center of a circle.
The centres of concentric circles coincide.
Circles or diameters which have identical centers.
sentences.chinese: 圆周或者直径有相同的圆心。

sentences.english: But if you use Green's theorem, well, we never used the fact that it is the circle of radius A at the origin.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你用格林公式，就不用管圆点是否在圆心。

sentences.english: And here, also pointing towards the center.
To see the illusion, look at the center of the circle and notice the peripheral shimmering.
sentences.chinese: 想看到这个幻视，盯住圆心，注意边缘的闪烁。

sentences.english: Two circle round hole hammer body through the distance between the meet collision equilibrium condition.
sentences.chinese: 两锤体圆透孔圆心之间的距离满足碰撞平衡条件。

sentences.english: The line connecting the point and the center bisects the included angle of the two tangent lines.
sentences.chinese: 这一点和圆心的连线平分这两条切线的夹角。

sentences.english: A perpendicular bisector of a chord passes through the centre and bisects the arc.
sentences.chinese: 弦的垂直平分线经过圆心，并且平分弦所对的两条弧。

sentences.english: A perpendicular bisector of a chord passes through the centre and bisects the arc .
sentences.chinese: 弦的垂直平分线经过圆心，并且平分弦所对的两条弧。

sentences.english: The double continuation itself is then carried out by drawing a series of circles about this point .
sentences.chinese: 接着进行成倍延拓，以该点为圆心，画出一系列圆。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
